anek nayakayan siyaludena eeta eka`gathwaya pala kota athi athara 40 wana ta8 samu`pawa yoda gath dinawalama ba්rasalshi pawathwimatath thiranaya kota atha.samu`pawa amathu janadhipathi barak obama rusiyawata erehiwa sambadhaka panawima sandaha methek thaman anugamanaya kala ki්rayamarga pilibanda wistharayak idiripath kota siyalu ratawal me karanayedi amerikawa samaga athwal bandaganu atha’yi wishwasa karana bawa pawasiya.

thama pamineddi shri lanka maha bankuwa thula kriyathmaka wuye (rthipadamachabagnya rthithachajagnyathagnyadaba irapabagnyatha) "paudgalika sthanagatha nikuth kirim kramaya" bawada bhandagara bandumkara 100% kma nikuth wuye ema kramayata bawada, eheth thama pamini wahama eki kramaya athhituwa (rthibhachathadaja eebhajabadadhada irapabagnyatha) "prasiddha wendesi nikuthu kramaya" kriyathmaka kala bawada sakshikaru kiya sitiyeya.

wiliyam kumarage birinda wana kembrij aaryawa putheku prasutha kala bawa kensintan maligaya niwedanaya kaleya.ema niwedanaye dakwenne, landan nagaraye shantha meri rohale di upatha lada bilindu kumara barin raththal atak saha...

una athi wi thibenne kisiyam wairas rogayakata goduruwime lakshanayak lesa nam rogi pudgalayata wadath hondin aahara laba dennata waga balaganna.

desa - basa - rasa pilibandawa kisidu hangimakin thorawa “oyagollanta” “oyata” kathakarana j.r. sanskruthiyak thula me mulu sha්ri lankawe daru parapura widula lama guwan widuliye “aadaraniya du daruwo” wuha.
aya poloniyam alfa kirana pilibandawa nibandhanayakda nima kalaya, ayirin 1925 di wayidya widyawa pilibanda widyagnygnyawariyak bawata path wiya.
eya 1930 dashakayedi jarmaniya thula nishpadanayawu ekak bawa boho denek danne naha.
“aa, mage yaluwek innawa amandige yaluwo anduraganna aasawen…”
emenma janamadhya kriyakarithwaya pilibanda soya bala wartha kirime wagakima mangalata saha harinta bhara dimatada kruthyadhikari mandalaya thiranaya kaleya.

emenma pasugiya yuda samaye siduwim hethuwen danata siradanduwam laba sitina damila sirakaruwan saha chodanawata lakwa bandhanagaragatha kara danata nadu katayuthu sidukaramin sitina piris wetha sahanayak labadena lesa th, ema sirakaruwan mathdrawya athulu wenath dushana chodanawalata lakwa sitina sirakaruwangen wenwa randawa thabana lesa da illimak kala siwajilingam mahatha athulu niyojitha pirisa, ema randawiyanta wruththiya nipunathawayan wetha yomuwimata awasthawak salasa dena lesa da janadhipathiwarayagen illa sitiyaha.
